source_objects.title: Home Improvement & Gardening
source_objects.description: Discover new how-to projects and learn advice from other do-it-yourselfers to fix up your home.

items.headline: Create Balance; Bagau Use; Change Energy By Making Feng Shui Based Changes; Course Journal Included
objectives_summary: Learn The Rich History Of Feng Shui
Learn How Feng Shui Is All About Energy
Learn About Home Décor Placement

items.title: The Home Mushroom Laboratory
items.headline: Make living mushroom cultures for growing ANY mushroom - On a tight budget and using basic equipment
objectives_summary: Cloning, using spores and growing living mushroom cultures from almost any mushroom
Expanding cultures for growing a limitless supply of mushrooms
Making grain spawn using petri dishes or liquid culture inoculation

items.title: Super Easy Seed Starting
items.headline: Grow Organic Seedlings for Your Garden
objectives_summary: Once you master the basics of seed starting it's an easily repeatable process year after year.

items.title: Learn To Grow Nutritious Microgreens Inside The House
items.headline: with very little time, budget and space.
objectives_summary: 2 weeks; a complete walkthrough video guide where you will be learning from seeding, each day progress to harvest with all necessary information & details.
Basic materials & equipment.
Setting up a grow setup.

items.title: Learn Organic Aquaponics From A Commercial Aquaponic Farmer
items.headline: Complete guide to making and operating a home aquaponic system
objectives_summary: Build the components of a home system
Assemble a home aquaponic system
Startup the system

items.title: How to Design and Build an Aquaponics Farm
items.headline: Learn the complete methodology of designing and building your very own small commercial aquaponics farm
objectives_summary: Designing an aquaponics system
Understanding the hydroponic and aquaculture components of aquaponics
Learning the anatomy of deep water culture beds

items.title: Attract Monarch Butterflies to your Garden

visible_instructors.name: Jessica
visible_instructors.title: Jessica McAtee
visible_instructors.job_title: Butterfly Conservationist, Semi-Digital Nomad, Tiny Houser

items.headline: Invite them to live in your backyard space by applying a scientific approach
objectives_summary: Create a Monarch Butterfly habitat.
Do something meaningful for conservation.
Unwind in the outdoors (and disconnect from screen-time and the rat-race).

items.title: Indoor Gardening
items.headline: Learn all about indoor gardening. From houseplants to growing vegetables inside!
objectives_summary: Learn about houseplants and growing indoors

items.title: Decoding the Flying Stars in Feng Shui-Go Behind the Scenes
items.headline: Delight in Your Better Fortune With Decorating Secrets to Perfect Your Home and Office
objectives_summary: Be ready to change the decor in your business or home every February, before the new Flying Stars arrive.
Decorate your business, home, office, or bedroom for better fortune, comfort and health.
Enjoy the extra peace and good fortune that comes from using the Flying Stars.

items.title: Downsize, Organize & Thrive
items.headline: How to live a minimalist lifestyle by reducing excess, putting your home in order, and freeing time for personal growth
objectives_summary: Clean, neat home and work space free of clutter and excess
Ability to thrive and accomplish other goals due to organized mindset and ability to focus in on what is important

items.title: 3 courses, Gardening, house plants, succulents for beginners
items.headline: Gardening for beginners, 5 houseplants for beginners and 5 succulents for beginners
objectives_summary: Gardening for beginners is a course to give you some ideas about simple, easy to care for plants and grass care that will make your garden into the envy of your neighbourhood and won’t require hours and hours of hard work.

5 houseplants for beginners, in this course, we’re going to look at five beautiful and easy-to-care for houseplants that are perfect for the beginner who wants to get green fingered. This course is aimed at any age and any level of expertise, and its full of hints and tips on how to keep our green friends happy and healthy.

5 succulents for beginners, in this course, we’re going to look at five beautiful and easy-to-care for succulents that are perfect for the beginner who wants to get green fingered. This course is aimed at any age and any level of expertise, and its full of hints and tips on how to keep our green friends happy and healthy. Plus, I’ve made sure to include succulents that are easy to come by, meaning you shouldn’t have much trouble trying to track them down.

items.title: 30 Days to Decluttered Bliss: How to Declutter Your World
items.headline: Unpacking the secrets of living a life of less
objectives_summary: You will have clean and organized closets, who doesn't want that?
With the bonuses contained within, you will reach decluttered bliss in no time
More than just clear physical space, having less grants you peace of mind

items.title: Things They Didn't Teach You In Garden School
items.headline: Experimental approaches to sustainable gardening practices
objectives_summary: Rule-breaking, experimental gardening founded in sustainable practices

items.title: Landscape Design Ideas -  Create a Better Looking Garden
items.headline: Learn basic design concepts while visiting various gardens including my own 6 acre botanical garden
objectives_summary: This course will illustrate landscape design principals while giving you new ideas for your garden.
It will teach concepts like focal points, proper scale, use of contrasts and balance.
Create a sun/shade map of the garden

items.title: Basics of Permaculture
items.headline: Discover the main permaculture principles and techniques, plus their applications!
objectives_summary: The basic principles & techniques of permaculture
Many ideas on improving your garden
The mindset of a permaculture designer

items.title: Landscape Design - Create a Design for Your Own Garden
items.headline: Learn the garden design process to create drawings and designs for you garden
objectives_summary: Learn how to create your own garden design
Create a site survey to document your current garden
Establish a wants and needs list and learn how to use it to prioritize your design decisions
